    • Constructor Detail

      • EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl

        public EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl(String hostRpc,
                                    String token,
                                    String privateKey,
                                    String contractAddressIdentity,
                                    String contractAddressCredential,
                                    int blockTime)
                             throws ParamEmptyException
        Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract. If the "contractAddress" argument is null a new Verification Registry smart contract is deployed on the ethereum network that is accessed through the "hostRPC".
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        privateKey - The private key used to interact with the smart contract. In smart contracts it is the msg.sender In this context this private key represents the issuer's private key.
        contractAddressIdentity - contract address corresponding to the Identity Manager contract to connect to. that are to be queried.
        contractAddressCredential - contract address VerifibleCredential.
        blockTime - time mining of block in milliseconds, it's optional by default it's 15000
        Throws:
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.

      • EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl

        public EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl(String hostRpc,
                                    String token,
                                    String privateKey,
                                    String contractAddressIdentity,
                                    String contractAddressCredential)
                             throws ParamEmptyException
        Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract. If the "contractAddress" argument is null a new Verification Registry smart contract is deployed on the ethereum network that is accessed through the "hostRPC".
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        privateKey - The private key used to interact with the smart contract. In smart contracts it is the msg.sender In this context this private key represents the issuer's private key.
        contractAddressIdentity - contract address corresponding to the Identity Manager contract to connect to. that are to be queried.
        contractAddressCredential - contract address VerifibleCredential.
        Throws:
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.

    • Method Detail

      • issueCredential

        public <T> String issueCredential(T subjectCredential,
                                  String[] credentialType,
                                  Date issuanceDate,
                                  Date expirationDate,
                                  ProofTypeBuilder proof,
                                  String id,
                                  String issuer)
                           throws MnidInvalidAddressException,
                                  IOException,
                                  org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException,
                                  ParamEmptyException,
                                  CapabilityException
        issues a verifiable credential whose hash must be registered permanently in a DLT for verification purposes.

        Specified by:
        issueCredential in interface CredentialIssuer
        Type Parameters:
        T - This is the type parameter
        Parameters:
        subjectCredential - Example: 
         
 "credentialSubject": {
     "@id": "did:example:abcd",
     "name": "John Doe",
     "birthdate": "2018-01-01"
   }
        credentialType - Example: 
         
 Example
["VerifiableCredential", "DisputeCredential"]
        issuanceDate - represents the initial time from which the credential is valid
        expirationDate - represents the time after which the credential wont be valid-
        proof - The proofType implementation that attach the proof section to the credential.
        id - id of credential, can be blank
        issuer - DID who emit the credential, The Decentralized identifier
        Returns:
        credential format json
        Throws:
        IOException - network exception
        MnidInvalidAddressException - mnid format error
        org.web3j.protocol.exceptions.TransactionException - transaction in blockchain error
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
        CapabilityException - capability no present
        See Also:
        credentialSubject
